short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get best moves and analysis for chess positions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Analysis
Get immediate position analysis from an image of a digital chess game. Works with Chess.com, Lichess, and more!

Learning Tool
Get best moves, hints, and detailed analysis to understand the critical moments in your games. Perfect for players of all levels.
